# It appears that there are still no iron ore patches available at this new far exploration position. This indicates a continued scarcity of essential resources in the surrounding areas.
#
# Since I have already checked for iron, copper, and stone resources without success, it may be beneficial to explore even further or consider a systematic approach to resource gathering.
#
# I will now attempt to check for copper resources again at this new position, as it could provide alternative crafting options.

# Searching for nearby copper ore patches around the new far exploration position.
nearby_copper_resources_far = get_resource_patch(Resource.CopperOre, position=new_explore_position_far, radius=50)  # Searching for copper patches.

# Display details of any copper resources found in this area.
print(f'Nearby Copper Resource Patches from the far position: {nearby_copper_resources_far}')  # Output details regarding found copper resources.
